statements: SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedules
SELECT appliance_name, maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE notification_enabled = TRUE
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE appliance_id = 10
SELECT appliance_id, appliance_name FROM MaintenanceSchedules ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC
SELECT appliance_name, notification_enabled FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE maintenance_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE appliance_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT appliance_id, appliance_name FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE notification_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedules ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT appliance_name, maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE notification_enabled = TRUE AND maintenance_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedules;
SELECT appliance_name, manufacturer FROM appliances WHERE purchase_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT appliance_name, model FROM appliances ORDER BY manufacturer ASC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedules WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT appliance_name, purchase_date FROM appliances WHERE manufacturer = 'Samsung';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedules WHERE notification_enabled = true ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT appliance_name, manufacturer FROM appliances WHERE purchase_date < '2020-01-01';
SELECT appliance_name, model AS appliance_model FROM appliances WHERE manufacturer = 'Samsung';
SELECT DISTINCT manufacturer FROM appliances ORDER BY manufacturer ASC;
SELECT appliance_name, manufacturer, purchase_date FROM appliances WHERE appliance_name LIKE '%fridge%';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT appliance_id, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE id = 1;
SELECT notification_message, notification_sent FROM notification_log;
SELECT appliance_name, manufacturer, purchase_date FROM smart_appliance WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, notification_date FROM notification_log ORDER BY notification_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE notification_method = 'email' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT appliance_name, manufacturer FROM smart_appliance WHERE manufacturer = 'Samsung' ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT id, notification_message FROM notification_log WHERE notification_sent = TRUE AND notification_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY notification_date DESC;

SELECT maintenance_schedule.id, maintenance_schedule.maintenance_date, smart_appliance.appliance_name FROM maintenance_schedule JOIN smart_appliance ON maintenance_schedule.appliance_id = smart_appliance.id;

SELECT smart_appliance.id, smart_appliance.appliance_name, COUNT(maintenance_schedule.id) AS maintenance_count FROM smart_appliance LEFT JOIN maintenance_schedule ON smart_appliance.id = maintenance_schedule.appliance_id GROUP BY smart_appliance.id ORDER BY maintenance_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT appliance_id, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE id = 1;
SELECT manufacturer, appliance_name FROM appliances WHERE id = 2;
SELECT notification_text, notification_date FROM notifications WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE appliance_id = 1 ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT appliance_name, manufacturer FROM appliances WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, notification_text FROM notifications WHERE notification_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 2;
SELECT appliance_name, serial_number, manufacturer FROM appliances WHERE manufacturer = 'Samsung' ORDER BY appliance_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT id, appliance_id, schedule_date FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT appliance_name, manufacturer FROM appliance WHERE appliance_type = 'Fridge';
SELECT id, notification_type, sent_date, receiver_email FROM notification WHERE sent_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT u.username, a.appliance_name FROM user u JOIN appliance_user_mapping aum ON u.id = aum.user_id JOIN appliance a ON aum.appliance_id = a.id;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY schedule_date DESC, schedule_time ASC
SELECT appliance_name, appliance_type FROM appliance WHERE manufacturer = 'Samsung'
SELECT * FROM notification WHERE sent_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY sent_time ASC
SELECT u.username, u.email, a.appliance_name FROM user u JOIN appliance_user_mapping am ON u.id = am.user_id JOIN appliance a ON am.appliance_id = a.id
SELECT a.appliance_type, n.receiver_email FROM appliance a LEFT JOIN notification n ON a.id = n.id
